head.title: Coronavirus Response - Northbrook District 28

input.name: __VIEWSTATE
__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.class: RadMenu RadMenu_ wrapword twelve columns offset-by-four telerik_main_menu NoIcon

div.div:
Resource for Parents Our district is collaborating with government agency leaders across Northbrook and Glenview to respond to the outbreak of COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus. The Glenview Northbrook COVID-19 Task Force issues weekly updated.
In addition, Superintendent Dr. Larry Hewitt is sending specific district-related updates. This page will provide a resource of messages and news for our District 28 families. Please see the menu to the right for each communication.
Community news and updates are also hosted by theGlenview Northbrook COVID-19 Task Force website.

span.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
